summary: This module contains unit tests for the StreamFeatureView component of the Feast SDK. It defines helper functions and a suite of test cases that verify creation, copying, initialization with optional fields omitted, protobuf type handling, serialization, user-defined function (UDF) integration, and materialization interval updates for streaming feature views.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of streaming feature view definitions in Feast to ensure reliable data pipeline configuration and execution.
